name: Notional Finance
description: Notional Finance is a fixed-rate crypto lending and borrowing platform. It helps users to earn interest with certainty and minimize yield volatility.

en.name: Notional Finance
en.description: Notional Finance is a fixed-rate crypto lending and borrowing platform. It helps users to earn interest with certainty and minimize yield volatility.

fr.name: Notional Finance
fr.description: Notional Finance est une plateforme de prêt et d'emprunt cryptographique à taux fixe. Il aide les utilisateurs à générer des intérêts avec certitude et à minimiser la volatilité des rendements.

es.name: Notional Finance
es.description: Notional Finance es una plataforma de préstamos y préstamos cripto de tasa fija. Ayuda a los usuarios a ganar intereses con certeza y minimizar la volatilidad de los rendimientos.

de.name: Notional Finance
de.description: Notional Finance ist eine Plattform für die Kreditvergabe und -aufnahme von Kryptowährungen mit festen Zinssätzen. Sie hilft Nutzern, mit Sicherheit Zinsen zu verdienen und die Volatilität der Erträge zu minimieren.

pt.name: Notional Finance
pt.description: Notional Finance é uma plataforma de empréstimo de cripto à taxa fixa. Ela ajuda os usuários a receber rendimentos assegurados, minimizando a volatilidade dos retornos.

el.name: Notional Finance
el.description: Notional Finance is a fixed-rate crypto lending and borrowing platform. It helps users to earn interest with certainty and minimize yield volatility.

tr.name: Notional Finance
tr.description: Notional Finance, sabit oranlı bir kripto borç verme ve ödünç alma platformudur. Kullanıcıların kesin olarak faiz kazanmasına ve getiri istikrarsızlığını en aza indirmesine yardımcı olur.

vi.name: Notional Finance
vi.description: Notional Finance is a fixed-rate crypto lending and borrowing platform. It helps users to earn interest with certainty and minimize yield volatility.

zh.name: Notional Finance
zh.description: Notional Finance 是一个固定利率借贷平台。帮助用户赚取确定的收益并最小化收益率的波动。

hi.name: Notional Finance
hi.description: Notional Finance एक फिक्स्ड-रेट क्रिप्टो लेंडिंग और बॉरोइंग प्लेटफॉर्म है। यह उपयोगकर्ताओं को निश्चित रूप से ब्याज अर्जित करने और उपज की अस्थिरता को कम करने में मदद करता है।

ja.name: Notional Finance
ja.description: Notional Finance is a fixed-rate crypto lending and borrowing platform. It helps users to earn interest with certainty and minimize yield volatility.

id.description: Notional Finance is a fixed-rate crypto lending and borrowing platform. It helps users to earn interest with certainty and minimize yield volatility.
